name: Sculpted Cape
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Adventurer's Armory 2 © 2017, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, F (cape or loose outer garment)
text: Your cape, cloak, or shawl stiffens and maintains its shape even if removed. A sculpted cape has hardness 2 and a number of hit points equal to your caster level, and it can support 1 pound of weight per caster level. An unworn sculpted cape can provide cover.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材 (披肩，或宽松的外衣)
text_zh: 你的围巾、斗篷或披肩硬化并且就算被移开也保持着它的形状。一件塑型围巾有着2点硬度以及等同你施法者等级的生命值，并且可以支撑每施法者等级/1磅重。一件未被穿着的塑形围巾可以提供掩蔽(cover)。
